Articles.Content: I want a ticket!

> 
> Yes. And much more. We're in metaspace, so SHUT UP AND ACKNOWLEDGE IT.

Is there such a thing as a hype PRR GGI? It would some infrastructure but it could run partially off the hype of people off the hypetrain.

> 
> Is there such a thing as a hype PRR GGI? It would some infrastructure but it could run partially off the hype of people off the hypetrain.

The HypeTrain already runs mostly off of the hype of people on the train.

I don't understand how I missed the hypetrain by a week! I looked for it the other day but didn't see any sign of it. Also what a rocky start, hopefully everyone that dislikes the Hype got off of the train a while ago... One ticket please!

i love KSP BUT I AINT ON THIS TRAIN. 

ROLL ON V1.1 then 1.18, then 1.19 then 1.24 then 1.25 etc etc

will be modding hell.
All three Experimentals have been updated.

My official hype train lounge station (two of which are in my living room)...

[http://images.vita-interiors.com/1/1395246396_98.jpg](http://images.vita-interiors.com/1/1395246396_98.jpg)

The hype train could be ground to a halt and I'll still be resting in comfort and style awaiting the next update.
Misthread.
I need a Hype-Barge for the SpaceX launch on Monday....
I'm back guys! I am ready for the hype!
First time I'd come across those new IVA pictures... very cool! Looking forward to 1.0, guess it's still a month or so away though.

> 
> First time I'd come across those new IVA pictures... very cool! Looking forward to 1.0, guess it's still a month or so away though.

My guess is May 5th, but with the holiday, maybe May 7th would be a better release date.

Gregroxmun will have to step things up if he wants to top the 298 pages that .24 earned. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

We are 8 days deep into experimentals, clock is ticking.

> 
> My guess is May 5th, but with the holiday, maybe May 7th would be a better release date.

Not sure about Mexico, but businesses aren't closed here in the US on May 5th for the holiday, so the holiday wouldn't be a factor.

> 
> On 9 May 1862, President JuÃƒÂ¡rez declared that the anniversary of the Battle of Puebla would be a national holiday regarded as "Battle of Puebla Day" or "Battle of Cinco de Mayo".
> Although Mexican citizens feel very proud of the meaning of the Anniversary of the Battle of Puebla, today it is not observed as a national holiday in Mexico. However, all public schools are closed nation-wide in Mexico on May 5. The day is an official holiday in the State of Puebla, where the Battle took place, and also a full holiday (no work) in the neighboring State of Veracruz.

-mercilessly stolen from wikipedia.
They're in Mexico City I believe (Maxmaps is anyway)? So, that would make them in the federal district (same thing as Washington DC), so I guess their business will be open.

Im out of monies ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

\*gets box of Hype coal\*

will this do as payment for a train ticket?

Can you rename this thread to the 'Official' hype train thread?

> 
> Gregroxmun will have to step things up if he wants to top the 298 pages that .24 earned. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) We are 8 days deep into experimentals, clock is ticking.

Not quite 8. Squad announced the "experimentals" phase on April 2, saying "The builds will ***soon*** be in the hands of..." Devnote Tuesday on April 7 revealed some last-minute goodness, and then finally, reports of experimental builds appeared.
Remember this experimentals phase is going to be longer than previous ones - so HYPE HYPE HYPE, but be ready for a longer period this time!

I am looking forward to the mining. I'm glad to see the devs putting time into something a little more...

Resourceful.

(Sorry)
